mapper.select: SELECT m.serial_num as serial_num, m.member_id, m.`password`, m.password_hint, m.password_hint_answer, m.reg_date, m.image_serial_num, ma.serial_num as auth_serial_num, ma.authority_type, ma.granted_date FROM member_account m left join member_authority ma on m.serial_num=ma.auth_owner_id where m.member_id=#{memberId}
